meanings.definition: A person who refers someone or something to another for information, help, or consideration.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a helpful referrer when I need advice on what book to read next.
meanings.sent2: The referrer suggested a great restaurant for our dinner date.
meanings.sent3: The referrer always knows the best places to find discounts on clothes.
meanings.sent4: She is like a human referrer, always guiding us to the best deals in town.
meanings.sent5: The referrer is like a walking encyclopedia of useful tips and recommendations.

meanings.definition: The website or webpage that directs traffic to another website.
meanings.sent1: Google is a popular referrer for many online businesses.
meanings.sent2: The referrer link on the blog led me to an interesting article.
meanings.sent3: The referrer website helped me discover a new online store for vintage items.
meanings.sent4: The referrer page acted like a virtual tour guide, leading me to hidden gems on the internet.
meanings.sent5: Thanks to the referrer site, I found a great recipe for chocolate chip cookies.
